spherical_position_t Struct Reference

#include <position.h>


Data Fields

COORDINATES_T r
COORDINATES_T th
COORDINATES_T ph

Detailed Description

For the spherical coordinates we use the "physical" notation
for theta and phi. That is to say that phi is the longitudinal coordinate whereas theta is the colatitudinal coordinate (the colatitudinal coordinate "starts" from the z-axis whereas the latitudinal coordinate "starts" from the x-y plan (i.e. the equator for the earth).
